Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students trying to communicate over a long distance using a string telephone.
The student can represent in the drawing how the string connects two cups to create the telephone.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string between the two cups.
The student can show how the design uses only the provided materials (e.g., cups, string) to solve the communication problem.
The student can describe in their drawing labels how the string telephone works or helps people communicate.
The student can include details in the drawing to explain how communicating over long distances can help people in different situations.
